name: CreditNoteRefundListing
description:
Retrieve a paginated list of credit note refunds.

Use this tool to get a list of all credit note refunds, including pagination information for navigating through large sets of data.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. Use this to specify which organization's credit note refunds to list.

parameters.name: customer_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the customer for whom the credit note is raised. Provide to filter refunds by customer.

value_schema.description: Customer ID of the customer for whom the credit note is raised.

parameters.name: refunds_sort_column
parameters.description: Specifies the attribute to sort the credit note refunds. Use values like 'refund_mode', 'reference_number', 'date', 'creditnote_number', 'customer_name', 'amount_bcy', or 'amount_fcy'.

value_schema.description: Sort refunds list. Allowed Values: refund_mode, reference_number, date, creditnote_number, customer_name, amount_bcy and amount_fcy

parameters.name: pagination_page_number
parameters.description: Page number for pagination to specify which page of results to retrieve. Default is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to display per page in the paginated results. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records per page for pagination. Controls how many credit notes are returned in each page. Default value is 200.
